sentence.Network_en: And he spent his senility on an archipelago, far away from here.
sentence.Network_cn: 当他年老的时候他住在了一个群岛上, 远离这里.

sentence.Network_en: The project is planned for Balta, one of the archipelago's main islands.
sentence.Network_cn: 计划此项目将建在群岛的主岛之一的巴尔塔岛上.

sentence.Network_en: The rich life of Svalbard, Norway's Arctic archipelago, faces a creeping thaw.
sentence.Network_cn: 生物资源丰富的斯瓦尔巴德群岛, 挪威的北极群岛, 面临逐渐解冻的危机.

位于风景秀丽的舟山群岛(Zhoushan archipelago)，占地约一万平方米，地处舟山市文教区，与浙江海洋大学为邻，空气洁净，环境整 …

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 16th cent.: from Italian arcipelago, from Greek arkhi- 'chief' + pelagos 'sea'. The word was originally used as a proper name (the Archipelago 'the Aegean Sea'): the general sense arose because the Aegean Sea is remarkable for its large numbers of islands

entry.def: An archipelago is a group of islands, especially small islands.

example.ex: ...the Azores, a rugged, volcanic archipelago of nine islands.
example.tran: 亚速尔群岛，由9个小岛组成的多岩石的火山群岛

means.word_mean: 1. a group of many islands in a large body of water
